boardgame.name: Ladies _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Gentlemen
淑女與紳士
boardgame.description: The unusual and asymmetric game Ladies _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Gentlemen brings players into the world of glamour. In teams of two _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; one playing a man, the other a woman _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; the players try to pull together the best-looking and most famous couple who will attend the big ball. The gentleman's duty is to make as much money as possible, which the lady will then spend on jewelry, clothes, and exclusive accessories. Each team has its own action cards to carry out its tasks, and the more that the players embody their characters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; flirtatious, fashion-obsessed ladies, and rich, arrogant, pretentious gentlemen _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; the more fun and explosive the game will be!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 50- The Staufer Dynasty and Rulebooks
The Good, The Board and the Jiggly: Episode 38 “Interview with Steampunk Rally Designer”

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Asmodee (ASMLADG01US) The art of spending your money to be elegant! Dive into the Victorian era and play, as a team, a stylish lady and gentleman. The victorious team is the one whose lady is the most elegant at the end of the game. Each gentleman will gain money from the Stock market by making sales and fulfilling contracts while his lady will fill her wardrobe with the most fashionable items from the various stores in the game.
